info.name: EBD
info.description:
# ðŸ“˜ EBD Project API - Postman Collection Guide

This collection allows you to **create and update project records** for the EBD (Equitable Building Decarbonization) program in Salesforce â€” using **Postman**, without needing direct Salesforce access.

---

## ðŸ” Step 1: Authenticate with Salesforce

1. Make sure the **EBD environment** is selected in the top-right corner of Postman.
    
2. Go to the collectionâ€™s **Authorization tab**.
    
3. Click **Get New Access Token**.
    
4. A browser window will open â€” log in with your Salesforce credentials.
    
5. Once authenticated, click **Use Token** in Postman.
    

You're now authenticated and can send requests.

---

## ðŸ†• Step 2: Create New Project/Projects Record (JSON/CSV)

## _Through JSON_

1. Endpoint: `POST` {{domain_url}}/services/apexrest/EBD/EBDAPIStage1Creation/
    
2. Click the **Body** tab â†’ choose `raw` â†’ set to `JSON`.
    
3. Use the JSON structure to add your data:
    
4. Click **Send**  
    âœ… A new project will be created.
    

## _Through CSV_

1. **Endpoint:** `POST` {{domain_url}}/services/apexrest/EBD/EBDAPIStage1Creation/  
    **Headers:** `Content-Type: text/csv`
    
2. In **Body**, choose `binary`.
    
3. Upload a `.csv` file.:
    
4. Click **Send**  
    âœ… Multiple projects will be created.
    

## âœï¸ Step 3: Update Existing Project/Projects Record (JSON/CSV)

## _Through JSON_

1. Endpoint: `PATCH` {{domain_url}}/services/apexrest/EBD/Update
    
2. In **Body**, choose `raw` â†’ set to `JSON`.
    
3. Use the JSON structure to add your data:
    
4. Click **Send**  
    âœ… The project will be updated.
    

## _Through CSV_

1. Endpoint: `PATCH` {{domain_url}}/services/apexrest/EBD/Update
    
2. **Headers:** `Content-Type: text/csv`
    
3. In **Body**, choose `binary`.
    
4. Upload a `.csv` file.:
    
5. Click **Send**  
    âœ… The project(S) will be updated.
    

# _**Please use this GITHUB LINK for JSON and CSV templates.**_

[https://github.com/subhammoha/EBD_DATA_Transmission](https://github.com/subhammoha/EBD_DATA_Transmission)

âš™ï¸ Notes

- **Authorization header** will auto-fill:  
    `Bearer {{access_token}}`
    
- If the token expires, go back to the **Authorization tab** and click **Get New Access Token**
    
- Replace any field names (like `Status__c`) if your Salesforce org uses different names
    

---

---

> ðŸ§  If you're not sure how to proceed or get an error, please contact the EBD Salesforce Support Team.
